caption: The chicken & pita bread was good! And it’s a nice location. The only thing missing is hot sauce 🤫

Horrible. They were out of chicken, but no big deal. Then the fries on the menu were $4 and the salad was $3 but they charged us $5 for the fries and $4 for the salad. We waited 15 minutes for our food before going back to see if they wrote down the wrong phone number and the food was sitting on the counter ready. The food was freezing cold cause it had clearly been sitting there for so long. We get back to the table and the text comes in that our food is ready mid meal.

This was the nastiest meal I’ve ever eaten. DON’T EAT HERE. It’s the worst place at armature works. Chicken tasted like dog food, the salad was gross, and everything else about it just made me lose my appetite. Wasted $15. It was so disgusting I had to throw it away and order food from a different place (I recommend going to the amazing taco place next door instead).

Their large portions are so small. I paid $15 for some chicken and a small salad. The salad is the hpm salad and the guy that works there asked me if I wanted a smalll or large and I ordered a large... I received an extra small. The chicken was horrible, the salad was soggy. The tomatoes were old. Not worth the money. I had to order a pizza from another place after spending $15 on this small plate. Also I am Mediterranean and this is nothing Mediterranean. I decided to give it chance even though every time I go to armature works there’s no one ordering from there and I wish I never ordered either. Absolutely horrible, waste of money and a disgrace to the Mediterranean food. That’s why there’s never anyone ordering there.
The best restaurant armature works has to offer. I always get something different here. Everything I’ve tried is excellent. From meze to vradino
The gyros are great, I wish I could give it 5 stars but the service was terrible. The guy at the register was rude and the woman at the back was touching the food with her bare hands.

Worst food  at Armature Works by far. The food tasted terrible. Not fresh at all. It started like it’s been setting for days. Cold and tasting horrible. The service is not any better. Zero stars overall.
Ordered two gyro platters with the chicken.  Very small portion of the chicken and very dry. Will not be buying there again. Too pricey for what you get.
My husband love this place. The gyro amazing and they have the best fries.

Was my first time at Armature Works last night was at Kipos during what seemed like a busy time.  I had an incredible Gyro plate , I watched them build my salad fresh on the plate, it wasn't pre made or anything  they even grabbed fresh prepped veggies that were not near the onions as i have an allergy, i really appreciate the accommodation during a busy time . Gyro meat was was a little dry but The flavor was all there, tasted incredible. Ill be back at Armature for sure
I was here on Wednesday lunch and ordered a gyro no pita. The staff had an attitude and the gyro was cold! I was very disappointed!

Food was great! It's about time Armature Works finally got something that gives great healthy lunch options as well as the salty bready options for the *cough* late nights. Staff was super friendly I actually came looking for the old salad spot but I was not disappointed with the replacement. See you next time motorcycle guy

I visited on a very busy Saturday night, the food was delicious and the staff was super friendly! The gyro was so good! The customer service was as great as the flavorful food! Keep it up, you're doing great! I'll definitely be back!
The gyro was a good gyro but a few things were wrong, the taste was a little off and it was not warm, so I suggest that if you want a good gyro you should go to hungry greek.

I am so bummed. I was excited to try this place!  The salad they gave me was supposed to be the HPM w/ chicken. What I received was neither the HPM nor the Kipos salad. It was missing key elements from both. No kalamatas, no pepperoncini, etc. For $13 I will not be going back to take another chance. There are too many other stalls in Armature doing things well. By the way, there was only one other customer, so not exactly a mistake due to rush hour. The employee to customer ratio was plentiful. The other customer, who ordered after me, received their order before I received my fairly simple salad. It was weird.
The gyro and baklava were FANTASTIC!!
Delicious! Great food, nice service, and beer - all bases covered
